Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th |Temporary Reroute at 111th/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 11th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th: due to, street blockage near 111th/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 11th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th: due to, street blockage near 111th/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Douglas/Drake
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park: due to, street blockage near Douglas/Drake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park: due to, street blockage near Douglas/Drake.

Northbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to track conditions.

Allow extra travel time.
